name: Ab Wheel
instructions: Hold the ab wheel with both hands and kneel on the floor.
Place the ab roller on the floor in front of your knees. This is your starting position.
Slowly roll the wheel forward in a controlled manner, stretching out the torso as far as you can without touching the floor with your body.
Stop when fully stretched and pause for a moment.
Pull yourself back to the starting position.

name: Aerobics
instructions: Choose your preferred aerobic activity (running, cycling, dancing, etc.).
Start with a light warm-up for 5 minutes.
Gradually increase intensity to your target heart rate zone.
Maintain consistent movement for your desired duration (20-60 minutes).
Cool down with 5 minutes of light activity and stretching.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Sit on a bench with back support, holding dumbbells at shoulder level with palms facing you.
This is your starting position.
As you begin to press the dumbbells overhead, rotate your wrists so your palms face forward.
Continue pressing until arms are fully extended overhead.
Reverse the motion, rotating palms back toward you as you lower to starting position.

name: Around the World
instructions: Lie on a flat bench holding a dumbbell with both hands directly above your chest.
Keep a slight bend in your elbows throughout the movement.
Lower the weight in an arc motion over and around your head.
Continue the circular motion, bringing the weight down toward your hips.
Complete the circle by bringing the weight back to starting position.
Repeat in the opposite direction.

name: Back Extension
instructions: Position yourself with proper posture and grip the handles or bar.
Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Pull the weight toward your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Control the weight as you return to the starting position.
Focus on using your back muscles, not just your arms.
Complete the desired number of repetitions.

name: Back Extension (Machine)
instructions: Position yourself with proper posture and grip the handles or bar.
Engage your core and keep your back straight.
Pull the weight toward your body, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Control the weight as you return to the starting position.
Focus on using your back muscles, not just your arms.
Complete the desired number of repetitions.

name: Ball Slams
instructions: Position yourself in the starting position with proper form.
Engage your core muscles and maintain a neutral spine.
Perform the movement with control, focusing on your core.
Breathe steadily throughout the exercise.
Hold or move through the full range of motion.
Return to starting position and repeat.

name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Position yourself on the bench or in starting position.
Grip the handles or weights firmly with proper hand placement.
Lower the weight in a controlled motion, feeling the stretch in your chest.
Press the weight back up, squeezing your chest muscles at the top.
Maintain control throughout the entire range of motion.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Position yourself properly for the exercise with correct form.
Engage your core and maintain proper posture throughout.
Perform the movement in a slow and controlled manner.
Focus on the target muscle group and maintain tension.
Complete the desired number of repetitions.
Rest adequately between sets.

name: Barbell Deadlift
instructions: Position yourself with proper posture and grip the handles or bar.
